title: Tomasz Gollob
summary: Tomasz Robert Gollob ([ˈtɔmaʂ ˈɡɔlːɔp] (listen); born 11 April 1971 in Bydgoszcz, Poland) is a former Polish motorcycle speedway rider. He appeared in every Speedway Grand Prix series between its inaugural season in 1995 and 2013. His brother Jacek is also a speedway rider.
